ComicInfo.Title: Tyrant of Mars Part Three of Five: New Life
ComicInfo.Summary:
John Carter desperately searches for the true identity of the tyrant who has dragged Mars into a planet-spanning crusade of racial extermination. Although Carter finds a ray of hope among his former enemies, the tyrant is tracking his every move...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1:2 | Regular Cover, 50/50 Split | Joe Jusko | 1 | 1:2 | Regular Cover, 50/50 Split | Lucio Parrillo | 2 | RE | Retailer Exclusive Dynamic Forces Red Risque Cover | Rafael Lanhellas | 3 | RI | Retailer Incentive Risque Cover | Rafael Lanhellas | 4 | RI | Retailer Incentive Risque Sketch Cover, Limited to 25 Copies | Rafael Lanhellas | Missing |
